author: sviens
msg: Updated BindingTemplateHandler.marshal() to include a valueless bindingKey attribute even when bindingKey is null. This ommission generated XML that did not conform to the v2 UDDI Schema. Also included logic to ensure that both an accessPoint element and a hostingRedirector element would never exist in the same bindingTemplate element.

author: sviens
msg: Updated TModelHandler.marshal() to include a valueless tModelKey attribute even when tModelKey is null. This ommission generated XML that did not conform to the v2 UDDI Schema.

author: sviens
msg: Updated BusinessServiceHandler.marshal() to include a valueless serviceKey attribute even when serviceKey is null. This ommission generated XML that did not conform to the v2 UDDI Schema.

author: sviens
msg: Updated BusinessEntityHandler.marshal() to include a valueless businessKey attribute even when businessKey is null.

author: sviens
msg: Fix for issue JUDDI-55. Handlers for BusinessEntity, BusinessService, BindingTemplate, TModel and OverviewDoc did not conform to the UDDI v2 XML Schema:  http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/JUDDI-55
